name: Earth vs Pluto
description:
Plutonians are big mad at Earth for declassifying their home as a planet! They are so mad, they have decided to Neonify the entire Milky Way Galaxy! It is your mission to stop the Plutonians before its too late through using your Jump Drive to reach Pluto and destroy their mothership!

Play through five unique levels!

Choose between three different weapons that offer distinctive play styles!
